plot: Set in a deep forest, a young tribesman is left behind of a hunting party as he is considered a novice. Unexpectedly he crosses paths with a mysterious goblin and has to find the courage to prove his worthiness to his elders.
title: Wildlings Within
plot_es: Set in a deep forest, a young tribesman is left behind of a hunting party as he is considered a novice. Unexpectedly he crosses paths with a mysterious goblin and has to find the courage to prove his worthiness to his elders.
plot_en: Set in a deep forest, a young tribesman is left behind of a hunting party as he is considered a novice. Unexpectedly he crosses paths with a mysterious goblin and has to find the courage to prove his worthiness to his elders.
